mewara tharagawaliyedi wadi dakshatha pradarshanaya wime prawanathawak athi bawata malala krida baladharin wisin tharagawaliyata pera puna puna anawaki pala kala namudu ikuth wasare pawathi jathika shurathawe dakshatha ha sasadana wita (mewara shri lanka wartha 2 yi, giyawara shri lanka wartha 4 yi) awama dakshatha wartha wimak lesa sandahan kala haka. 2010 wasare bangladeshaye dhaka aganuwara pawathi dakunu aasiyanu krida ulelin aarambha wu merata malala krida kshethraye gara watima kramayen ikuth wasarema pawathi podurajya mandalayiya krida ulela (nawadilliya) aasiyanu krida ulela (guwanshu) 2011 juli masaye pawathi aasiyanu shuratha malala krida tharagawaliya (kobe) haraha ikuthda awasan wu 89 wani jathika shuratha jawana ha pitiya malala krida tharagawaliya dakwama jathyanthara mattamin menma jathika mattaminda wardhanayawima kapi penini.

bambalapitiya kotipathi wyaparikayage ghathana siddhiya sambandhayen chodana laba sitina basnahira uthura niyojya polispathi was gunawardhana mahatha me masa 25 wana dina dakwa rakshitha bandhanagaragatha karana lesa kolambaa athireka mahesthrath mohomad sahabdin mahatha eeye (13) niyama kaleya.hadisi rogi thaththwayak yatathe kolambaa jathika rohale prathikara labana niyojya polispathiwaraya nirikshanaya sandaha ehi giya mahesthrath sahabdin mahatha sakakaru digatama wishesha bandhanagara aarakshawa yatathe jathika rohale randawa thabana lesata da niyama kaleya.palanaya kala nohaki diyawadiyawa, adhirudhira pidanaya ha hruda rogayen pelena niyojya polispathiwaraya eeye (13) dahawal kolambaa jathika rohala wetha athulath kala bawata rahas polisiya adhikaranayata dakwu karunu salaka balamin mahesthrathwaraya sakakaru pariksha kirimata kolambaa jathika rohala wetha giyeya.eeye (13) mosamak magin adhikaranaya hamuwe karunu dakwamin rahas polisiye sahakara polis adhikari shani abesekara mahatha pawasa sitiye polis rohale pradhana waidyawaraya sakakaruge sharira saukhya pariksha karanu labu bawath ehidi mage angata amaruwak danenawa rohalata yanna oone kiwu bawath ebawin kolambaa jathika rohalata athulath kala bawaya..

pasugiya rajaya pawathi samaye dida parisara ha punarjananiya balashakthi amathya susil pe්ramajayantha mahatha wisin wana sanrakshana departhamenthuwata, madhyama parisara adhikariyata ha bhu widya samikshana ha pathal karyanshayata karana lada dadi balapama matha amathyathuma ge puthanuwan ge hithawathun thidenekuta ha pawathi wallawaya pa්radeshiya sabhawe sabhapathithuman ge birinda hata nithi wirodhi lesa mema sthanaye sudu thiriwana kanima sandaha yantha්rika kanim balapatha්ra hatharak bhu widya samikshana ha pathal karyanshaya magin nikuth kerina.
